experiment_info.name: reduced_fevals_more_polish
experiment_info.description: Trade CMA-ES fevals (15/28) for extended NM polish (12 iters)
experiment_info.hypothesis: Reducing CMA-ES fevals while increasing NM polish may maintain accuracy within time budget

abort_reason: Prior evidence conclusive: (1) EXP_EARLY_STOP_CMA_001 showed CMA-ES improves >1% throughout - reducing fevals hurts accuracy. (2) EXP_EXTENDED_POLISH_001 showed 12 polish = +24 min for only +0.0015 score. Trading fevals for polish is not viable.

prior_evidence.EXP_EARLY_STOP_CMA_001: CMA-ES continues improving >1% throughout - reducing fevals may hurt accuracy
prior_evidence.EXP_EXTENDED_POLISH_001: 12 polish iters = 82.3 min (+24 min) for +0.0015 score
